snippet: House Republicans take action on he biggest, wettest and most ambitious memorial to President Ronald Reagan.
abstract: Editorial mocks Republican proposal to rename 3.4 million square nautical miles of ocean surrounding the United States in honor of Pres Ronald Reagan; notes there are already more than 3,000 memorials in his name.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans take action on he biggest, wettest and most ambitious memorial to President Ronald Reagan.

headline.main: The Gipper and the Deep Blue Sea
headline.print_headline: The Gipper and the Deep Blue Sea
